page.title: 03BISHOP'S TACHBROOK p.1
page.content: Bishop's Tachbrook is a small village about 3 miles outside Leamington Spa.It has a parish church- {St.Chads,}a post office and two shops- a newsagents and a general store.There is a modern Middle School,of 180 pupils.The village is poorly served by buses,for there are only two per day, into L.Spa. The housing represents a mixture of very old thatched and timbered cottages,council houses,modern detached and semi-detached houses and bungalows.There is a new housing development, at present unfinished, which comprises four-bedroom detached houses and one- or two-bedroomed appartments.
